edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.gui2d
Class ContextMenu

java.lang.Object
  Menu
      edu.ucsd.ccdb.ontomorph2.view.gui2d.ContextMenu

public class ContextMenu
extends Menu

A dynamic context menu that pops up when you right click in the display. about the design of this class is available on the website.

Author:
Stephen D. Larson (slarson@ncmir.ucsd.edu), caprea

See Also:
TYPE_s

cellFactory

public NeuronMorphology cellFactory(java.lang.String cellType,
                                    java.lang.String modelURL,
                                    Curve3D crvParent,
                                    boolean updateView)
For conveiniance, cells can be created without updating the scene. This may be useful for making many cells at once. If the parameters are erroneous, the factory will attempt to make a free-floating cell

Parameters:
cellType - Semantic string
modelURL - String to the filename of the 3D-model file
crvParent - The parent curve to attach the cell to. If null, the cell will be free-floating.
updateView - True - forces Viewto update the scene. If creating many cells at once, it is nice to only redraw at the end
Returns:
cell created
